I have followed the steps on the link above up until step 5. When i compile the project i get the error below. what am i missing?

Partial declarations of 'ModernUI.MainWindow' must not specify different base classes
Make sure you modify both MainWindow.xaml and MainWindow.xaml.cs (step 4). They both need to derive from ModernWindow.
